name: pulsar-find-references
description: An IDE UI package for highlighting references to the token under the cursor

show-references.description: Show a list of project references for a given buffer position or range.

enable.title: Highlight References on Cursor Movement
enable.description: When checked, matching references will be highlighted in the editor itself whenever the cursor moves. When unchecked, you must invoke the **Pulsar Find References: Highlight** command to highlight references under the cursor.

skipCurrentReference.title: Skip Current Reference
skipCurrentReference.description: When enabled, the reference currently under the cursor won’t be highlighted.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: How long, in milliseconds, to wait after the cursor moves before attempting to highlight similar tokens. (Has no effect if the above setting is unchecked.)

ignoreThreshold.title: Threshold for Ignoring Decorations
ignoreThreshold.description:
A ratio for how many references need to be suggested in a given file before we decide that it’s too many to be worth showing. For instance, if the cursor lands on `true`, some language servers might be inclined to try to return references to all `true`s in the file — which typically isn’t helpful.

This setting defaults to `0`, which **disables** this behavior. To enable it, set it to a value between `0` and `1`. For example, `0.2` means that, in a hypothetical 1000-line file, we’d ignore any effort to decorate a list of more than 200 references. **This setting applies to scrollbar decoration as well.**

scrollbarDecoration.title: Scrollbar Decoration
scrollbarDecoration.description: Settings for the annotations that appear behind an editor’s vertical scrollbar.

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: When checked, matches in a given editor will be marked underneath the scrollbar.

markerColor.title: Marker Color
markerColor.description: The color to use for marking the gutter.

markerOpacity.title: Marker Opacity
markerOpacity.description: The desired opacity for scrollbar markers. Must be a number between `0` and `1`.

panel.title: Results Panel
panel.description: Settings for the panel that appears when **Find References: Show Panel** is invoked.

splitDirection.title: Direction to Open Results Pane
splitDirection.description: Direction to split the active pane when showing reference results. If `none`, the results will be shown in the active pane.

enableDebugLogging.title: Enable Debug Logging
enableDebugLogging.description: When checked, will log diagnostic information to the console.
